title: PACT Data Responsibility Extension Schema
description: A Pathfinder Data Model Extension to track the people responsible for data generation, entry, and review in the Product Carbon Footprint calculation.

dataGeneratorName.description: Name of the person responsible for generating the PCF data

dataGeneratorEmail.description: Email address of the person responsible for generating the PCF data

dataEntryName.description: Name of the person responsible for entering the PCF data into the system

dataEntryEmail.description: Email address of the person responsible for entering the PCF data into the system

dataReviewerName.description: Name of the person responsible for reviewing the PCF data

dataReviewerEmail.description: Email address of the person responsible for reviewing the PCF data
